content: Savings Asked by AnonymousAsked on 21 Sep 2019I can't sync my OCBC account to Seedly now?I synced it before in July, but I can't do it now?3 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Charmaine Lim XiaomeiLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 22 Sep 2019Hi Anon! I had the same issue too and here's the solution provided by the support team:We kindly ask you to log into your bank's web interface at https://internet.ocbc.com/internet-banking and change the access code as the provider has requested. Then, please connect once again from Seedly using new credentials.0 comments1
